channel.title: I need help with antiflood
channel.description:
I got the antiflood from here... http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=445776.0
and when I put those in, I can't log in, but the other players can, on my side is shows no server response try a different world. If someone could look at the code and tell me if its supposed to do that or if its not, how can I make to where I can keep the antiflood and login.
BTW I am hosting from my computer, just if that helps with anything. Im running a 562 source.

item.title: I need help with antiflood
item.dc:creator: @ikilledhomer ikilledhomer
item.description:
@ikilledhomer wrote:

I got the antiflood from here… http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=445776.0

and when I put those in, I can’t log in, but the other players can, on my side is shows no server response try a different world. If someone could look at the code and tell me if its supposed to do that or if its not, how can I make to where I can keep the antiflood and login.
